data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "The internet allows us to share information quickly and easily, but this constant flow of information may cause personal and social problems. Describe some of the negative consequences of this flood of information."
data.answer: Nowadays, people can share information quickly and easily when they are communicating on their computers thanks to the invention of the internet. But this constant flow of information may lead to negative consequences that have impacts on people’s personal and social life. To start with, as the information is shared quickly and easily, people’s personal information may not be protected, which may be illegally used by third parties. The constantly shared information on the internet can also lead to internet fraud, which harms society. In conclusion, the constantly shared information on the internet can have negative impacts on both personal life and society. (108 字)
